creator: DisasterAWARE (Automated)
hazard_Name: Wildfire - NW of Saurimo, Lunda Sul - Angola
description: Wildfire Information: Significant wildfire activity has been observed in NW of Saurimo, Lunda Sul - Angola and detected at September 17, 2020 0856 GMT. PDC categorizes the severity to be at INFORMATION level.  Based on preliminary analysis of recent satellite observations, it is estimated that 275 people, 48 households, and $2.19 Million (USD) of Infrastructure * are potentially affected. * The cost represents the total replacement value of the infrastructure.
